results.title: Life-Threatening Acidosis With Metformin and Dapagliflozin Combination Therapy: A Case Report
results.text_hl: Clinicians should remain cognizant of the possibility of severe @DISEASE_Acidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@acidosis@@@ with the combination therapy of @CHEMICAL_dapagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C529054 @@@dapagliflozin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in severe @<m>DISEASE_Dehydration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003681 @@@dehydration@@@.

citations.NLM: Gupta S, Mohta A, Temitope S. Life-Threatening Acidosis With Metformin and Dapagliflozin Combination Therapy: A Case Report Cureus. 2023 Feb;15(2):e35497. PMID: 37007332

results.title: COVID-19 is associated with high blood glucose levels: diabetic neuropathy during the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic: a case report.
results.text_hl: Seventeen years prior, she was diagnosed with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ 1.5 g twice a day and @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@glibenclamide@@@ 10 mg twice a day were part of her therapy regimen.

citations.NLM: Bereda G. COVID-19 is associated with high blood glucose levels: diabetic neuropathy during the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic: a case report. Ann Med Surg (Lond). 2024 Dec;86(12):7318-7321. PMID: 39649935

results.title: Effects of water deprivation on the pharmacokinetics of metformin in rats.
results.text_hl: After oral administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to the @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Dehydration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003681 @@@dehydration@@@, the AUC was significantly greater (99.2% increase) than the controls.

citations.NLM: Choi YH, Lee I, Lee MG. Effects of water deprivation on the pharmacokinetics of metformin in rats. Biopharm Drug Dispos. 2007 Oct;28(7):373-83. PMID: 17657786

results.title: Metformin-associated lactic acidosis precipitated by diarrhea.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@-associated @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ (@DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@MALA@@@) is a serious @DISEASE_Brain_Diseases_Metabolic_Inborn @DISEASE_MESH:D020739 @@@metabolic complication@@@ that occurs because of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ accumulation in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ who become @<m>DISEASE_Dehydration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003681 @@@dehydrated@@@ or developed @DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute renal failure@@@.

citations.NLM: El-Hennawy AS, Jacob S, Mahmood AK. Metformin-associated lactic acidosis precipitated by diarrhea. Am J Ther. 2007 Jul-Aug;14(4):403-5. PMID: 17667216
citations.BibTeX: @article{17667216, title={Metformin-associated lactic acidosis precipitated by diarrhea.}, author={El-Hennawy AS and Jacob S and Mahmood AK}, journal={Am J Ther}, volume={14}, number={4}, pages={403-5}}

results.title: Metformin induces renal medullary interstitial cell apoptosis in type 2 diabetic mice.
results.text_hl: METHODS: @SPECIES_10090 @@@Mice@@@ (C57BL/6, db/m, and db/db) were treated with 450 mg/kg @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for 7 days and subjected to 24-h water restriction (=@<m>DISEASE_Dehydration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003681 @@@dehydration@@@) before being killed.

citations.NLM: Zheng S, Liu J, Han Q, Huang S, Su W, Fu J, Jia X, Du S, Zhou Y, Zhang X, Guan Y. Metformin induces renal medullary interstitial cell apoptosis in type 2 diabetic mice. J Diabetes. 2014 Mar;6(2):132-46. PMID: 24405721

results.title: Fulminant lactic acidosis in two patients with Type 2 diabetes treated with metformin.
results.text_hl: We recommend that all @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ should consider discontinuation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment in the event of a severe medical condition causing @<m>DISEASE_Dehydration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003681 @@@dehydration@@@.

citations.NLM: Brassøe R, Elkmann T, Hempel M, Gravholt CH. Fulminant lactic acidosis in two patients with Type 2 diabetes treated with metformin. Diabet Med. 2005 Oct;22(10):1451-3. PMID: 16176212

results.title: [Fatal lactic acidosis due to metformin in a male with type 2 diabetes mellitus and dehydration. Comments about a patient information leaflet].
results.text_hl: [Fatal @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ due to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in a male with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Dehydration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003681 @@@dehydration@@@.

results.title: [Metformin-associated lactic acidosis can be treated with continuous renal replacement therapy].
results.text_hl: In rare cases, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may cause @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@, especially when administered during periods of @<m>DISEASE_Dehydration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003681 @@@dehydration@@@.

citations.NLM: Korvenius Jørgensen H, Nielsen JS, Gilsaa T. [Metformin-associated lactic acidosis can be treated with continuous renal replacement therapy]. Ugeskr Laeger. 2012 Jun 4;174(23):1602-3. PMID: 22673380

results.title: [Biguanide].
results.text_hl: Caution is advised to avoid use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ at risk for @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ (e.g., in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with advanced @DISEASE_Hepatic_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D048550 @@@renal and liver insufficiency@@@, @DISEASE_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Dehydration</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003681 @@@dehydration@@@, @DISEASE_Alcoholism @DISEASE_MESH:D000437 @@@alcoholism@@@, or in those using diuretics or @GENE_SLC5A2 @GENE_6524 @@@SGLT2@@@ inhibitor).

citations.NLM: Ohta A, Tanaka Y. [Biguanide]. Nihon Rinsho. 2015 Mar;73(3):397-401. PMID: 25812364
